required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tissue Study in Patients Undergoing CAR-T Cell Therapy (CAR_21_01)
clinical_study.official_title: Tissue Study in Patients Undergoing CAR-T Cell Therapy

primary_outcome.description: Study of epigenetics in peripheral blood samples taken from patients undergoing CAR-T therapy. In particular, the epigenetic analysis will be performed in the circulating leukocyte and extracellular fraction contained in the plasma nanovesicles in order to determine the epigenome and its correlation with the clinical outcome.
study of microRNAs extracted from extracellular vesicles and leukocytes of patients undergoing CAR-T therapy in order to correlate levels with clinical outcome.

primary_outcome.measure: study of lymphocyte and myeloid populations
primary_outcome.description: study of lymphocyte and myeloid populations in the haematological patient PRE and POST CAR-T cell infusion in order to correlate the levels with the clinical outcome.

study_pop.textblock: Nell'ambito del normale percorso assistenziale verranno arruolati tutti i pazienti ammessi a essere sottoposti a CAR-T Therapy.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Patients aged ≥ 18 years. Patients with haematological pathology admitted to be subjected to CAR-T Therapy at the Advanced Cell Therapy Program, IRCCS University Hospital of Bologna.
Patients who consent to participate in this study after signing informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
-

overall_official.affiliation: Advanced Cell Therapy Program, IRCCS University Hospital of Bologna
